EmailTemplate.subject: How to Milk Your VMTurbo Trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We Gave You The Cow. Now Milk It.
CLICK TO REQUEST A FREE DEMO: <http://bit.ly/1wkElmq>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Now that you've licensed your trial, VMTurbo's Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Mdfu0g> guides you through the process of Discover-Converge-Control-Plan, so you can fully leverage your VMTurbo Operations Manager trial for the next 30 glorious days. We gave you the cow. Now we're going to help you milk it.
- Watch this disarmingly cute yet informative video <http://bit.ly/1k2rfjP> on our Economic Scheduling Engine (ESE), the abstraction model that recasts the resources of your environment as a free market of buyers and sellers, trading scarce goods and constantly driving the system to dynamic equilibrium. - Schedule a free assessment <http://bit.ly/1gzh9Hf> with one of our experienced dairy farmers, who can answer your questions and provide you with real-time feedback.
Questions or comments? Moo <http://bit.ly/1gHVfGN>.
Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
